text: Mississippi is a 1935 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by A. Edward Sutherland and is based on the novel Magnolia by Booth Tarkington. It stars Bing Crosby, W. C. Fields, Joan Bennett, Queenie Smith, Gail Patrick, Claude Gillingwater and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1935 romantic comedy movies Category:1935 musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by A. Edward Sutherland Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Mississippi (movie)
